medium: Pastel on paper, laid down on canvas
title: Two Harvesters
marks:
Signature, Date, Inscriptions and Mark

Inscribe Signed and dated in black chalk, LR: [L Lhermitte
description: two men lean over farming instruments, cleaning them. They are harvesting in a field. A few trees stand in the background. The sky is light and sunny.
creditline: Lent by the Heirs of Louis Hill, Sr.
